mutants.original_line: return [word for word in words if remove_nonletters(word).lower() in targets and is_palindrome(word)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in words if remove_nonletters(word).lower() in targets or is_palindrome(word)]

mutants.original_line: return "".join(ch for ch in word if ch.isalpha())
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join((ch for ch in word if ch.isalpha()))

mutants.original_line: return [word for word in words if remove_nonletters(word).lower() in targets and is_palindrome(word)]
mutants.mutated_line: return [word for word in words if remove_nonletters(word).lower() not in targets and is_palindrome(word)]
